short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The smartest bookmarks with Compass Insight

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Compass Insight is a next-generation market intelligence solution: you select the sources of information that matter to you, news, blogs, social, websites, etc. Compass will aggregate them for you, filter only what's relevant, and categorise it your way.
Compass is for those who need to monitor large amounts of information to find gems, build business cases and identify patterns
- teams with a focus on strategy, innovation and competitive intelligence
- teams who need to identify great content to share with their customers
This Chrome extension will allow you to upload relevant content to your Compass Insight account straight from the browser. Ever-growing list of unmanageable bookmarks: no more.
Get in touch to find out more.
